title: Crown of Chaos
description: From USA Today Bestselling Author Amelia Hutchins comes a tale of love, war, and treachery. Aria faces new challenges and tribulations within the Nine Realms. One king who yearns to control her, and own her body, mind, and soul . . . A council who has deemed her too dangerous to live . . . And one fate she never asked for, but can’t escape. What’s a girl to do? Within the Nine Realms, treachery runs deep. War lingers on the horizon, as armies gather deeply within the shadows. The land has chosen its hero, but war demands a hefty price—one Aria may not be willing to pay. Those she thought to trust have betrayed her. The council has declared her the enemy. Everything that can be stolen from her has been snatched from her grasp. When everyone is pushing her to become the villain they claim her to be, will she be able to become the monster the realms need?Aria was created to rule the Nine Realms. Will she allow them to guide her future, or will she forge her own path? Well-behaved women never make history. But no one forgets the misbehaved woman with honed claws and teeth.
author: Amelia Hutchins
